mapper.select: select * from book where name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT book.`name`, book.publisher, book.author, `user`.username, `user`.`name` AS name_0, record.id, record.create_time, record.return_time, record.user_id, record.book_id FROM record JOIN book ON record.book_id = book.id JOIN `user` ON record.user_id = `user`.id where user_id = #{userId}
